Buttons

Standard Buttons

The most common buttons used throughout the website.

Button class="" Description
Primary btn btn-primary Primary Blue button
Default btn btn-default Default button
Donate btn btn-danger Red button for donations
Download btn btn-success Button for resource downloads
Read More »   Read More link 
<a href="" class="btn btn-default">Standard button</a>
<a href="" class="btn btn-danger">Donate button</a>
<a href="" class="btn btn-success">Download button</a>
<a href="">Read More »</a>

Dropdown Button

Within a div with a class of .btn-group, add a button with a class of dropdown-toggle and data-toggle="dropdown" to any button followed by a ul with a class of dropdown-toggle and role="menu".

  • Become a Member
  • Renew Membership
  • Change Membership Details
  • Membership Fees
<div class="btn-group">
	<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="dropdown">
		Membership <span class="caret"></span>
	</button>
	<ul class="dropdown-menu" role="menu">
		<li><a href="#">Become a Member</a></li>
		<li><a href="#">Renew Membership</a></li>
		<li><a href="#">Change Membership Details</a></li>
		<li><a href="#">Membership Fees</a></li>
	</ul>
</div>

Full Width Button

Add a class of .btn-block to any button to make the button full width.

Full Width Button 
<a class="btn btn-primary btn-lg btn-block">Full Width Button</a>

Sized Buttons

Buttons can easily be sized to command a greater visual importance. Use the class of .btn-small, .btn-medium or .btn-large to specify the botton size. The default size is medium.

Large Button

Default Button

Small Button

Extra Small Button 
<a class="btn btn-primary btn-large">Large Button</a>

<a class="btn btn-primary">Default Button</a>

<a class="btn btn-primary btn-sm">Small Button</a>

<a class="btn btn-primary btn-xs">Extra Small Button</a>

Button with Tooltip

A tooltip can be added to a donate button to provide the visitor with additional information about the buttons action. Based on the buttons position, the dada-placement value can be changed to top, left, right or bottom. Bottom should be used where possible.

Hover to See Tooltip 
<a class="btn btn-danger" data-original-title="Tooltip Text" data-placement="right" data-toggle="modal" href="#" id="btndonate" rel="tooltip" role="button">Donate Online Now</a>
